actions.name: Balance
actions.description: Move across a narrow surface or uneven ground. You are off-guard while balancing.

actions.name: Tumble Through
actions.description: Stride up to your Speed and try to move through the space of one enemy.

actions.name: Maneuver in Flight
actions.description: Try a difficult maneuver while flying, such as reversing direction or flying against wind.

actions.name: Squeeze
actions.description: Contort yourself to squeeze through a space so small you can barely fit through.

actions.name: Recall Knowledge
actions.description: Remember information about arcane theories, magic, constructs, dragons, and elementals.

actions.name: Decipher Writing
actions.description: Understand archaic or esoteric texts about arcane theory.

actions.name: Identify Magic
actions.description: Spend 10 minutes to identify the properties of a magic item, location, or effect.

actions.name: Learn a Spell
actions.description: Learn a new arcane spell from a teacher or book (requires materials).

actions.name: Borrow an Arcane Spell
actions.description: Prepare a spell from someone else's spellbook.

actions.name: Climb
actions.description: Move up, down, or across an incline. You are off-guard while climbing.

actions.name: Force Open
actions.description: Forcefully open a door, window, container, or heavy gate.

actions.name: Grapple
actions.description: Grab a creature or object with your free hand.

actions.name: High Jump
actions.description: Stride and then jump vertically.

actions.name: Long Jump
actions.description: Stride and then jump horizontally.

actions.name: Reposition
actions.description: Muscle a creature or object around to a different position.

actions.name: Shove
actions.description: Push a creature away from you.

actions.name: Swim
actions.description: Move through water.

actions.name: Trip
actions.description: Knock a creature to the ground.

actions.name: Disarm
actions.description: Knock an item out of a creature's grasp.

actions.name: Recall Knowledge
actions.description: Remember info about digital equipment, hazards, programs, and vidgames.

actions.name: Access Infosphere
actions.description: Research information on a local network (10 minutes).

actions.name: Operate Device
actions.description: Perform a basic task using a digital device or program.

actions.name: Decipher Writing
actions.description: Understand code or programming languages.

actions.name: Disable a Device
actions.description: Disarm a computerized trap or complex digital mechanism.

actions.name: Hack
actions.description: Access, control, or change an active secured system (requires hacking toolkit).

actions.name: Recall Knowledge
actions.description: Assess value of items, tech gear, engineering, and tech creatures.

actions.name: Repair
actions.description: Fix a damaged item (10 minutes, requires repair toolkit).

actions.name: Craft
actions.description: Create an item from raw materials (requires formula and tools).

actions.name: Earn Income
actions.description: Craft goods for the market to earn money.

actions.name: Create a Diversion
actions.description: Distract creatures to become Hidden.

actions.name: Impersonate
actions.description: Create a disguise to pass as someone else (10 minutes).

actions.name: Lie
actions.description: Fool someone with an untruth.

actions.name: Feint
actions.description: Mislead an opponent in melee to make them off-guard.

actions.name: Gather Information
actions.description: Canvass local areas to learn about a specific topic (approx. 2 hours).

actions.name: Make an Impression
actions.description: Converse for 1 minute to improve someone's attitude toward you.

actions.name: Request
actions.description: Ask a friendly or helpful creature for a favor.

actions.name: Coerce
actions.description: Bully a creature into doing what you want (1 minute).

actions.name: Demoralize
actions.description: Shake an enemy's resolve to make them Frightened.

actions.name: Recall Knowledge
actions.description: Retrieve information about the specific subject of the Lore skill.

actions.name: Earn Income
actions.description: Practice a trade related to your Lore to earn money.

actions.name: Recall Knowledge
actions.description: Info about diseases, poisons, wounds, and forensics.

actions.name: Administer First Aid
actions.description: Stabilize a dying creature or stop bleeding (requires medkit).

actions.name: Treat Disease
actions.description: Spend 8 hours caring for a diseased creature to help them recover.

actions.name: Treat Poison
actions.description: Treat a patient to prevent the spread of poison.

actions.name: Treat Wounds
actions.description: Spend 10 minutes to restore Hit Points to a wounded creature.

actions.description: Info about fauna, flora, geography, weather, and primal magic.

actions.name: Command an Animal
actions.description: Issue an order to an animal.

actions.name: Identify Magic

actions.name: Learn a Spell

actions.description: Learn a new occult spell.
